title: Surprisingly Simple Solution: Seamless Cooking on the 800 Series Gas Cooktop
description:
Bosch appliances provide the perfect balance of form and function, and the 800 Series Gas Cooktop is no exception. Continuous grates allow for a seamless transition of pots and pans between burners, and the low profile design helps to limit spills. 

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Bosch Appliances. Shop for Bosch 800 Series Gas Cooktops as well as the full line of Bosch Appliances at Abt today!
